mensajeDeBienvenida: Welcome to our budget and financial health application! Here you can keep track of your finances and improve your economic situation. Register now and start achieving your financial goals!
laContraseñaDebeTenerAlMenos8Caracteres: The password must have at least 8 characters.
laContraseñaDebeContenerAlMenosMayuscula: The password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
elAñoDebeSerValido: The birth year must be a valid year.
elNombreTieneComoMaximo: The name must have a maximum of 50 characters
porcentajeMayorOIgual: The savings percentage must be greater than or equal to 0
porcentajeMenorOIgual: The savings percentage must be less than or equal to 100
descripcionMaximoCaracteres: The description must have a maximum of 250 characters

seHaActualizadoCorrectamenteEntrada: The entry has been correctly updated

seguroQueDeseasEliminarBoard: Are you sure you want to delete the selected
seguroQueDeseasEliminarCategoria: Are you sure you want to delete the selected category?

amountObligatorio: The amount is a mandatory field
periodObligatorio: The period is a mandatory field
